transfer.title: Transfer was successful
transfer.description: The amount of {{amount}} Rials has been transferred from your wallet to account number {{cardNumber}}.

add.title: Wallet successfully recharged
add.description: Your wallet has been recharged with the amount of {{amount}} Rials.

refund.title: Withdrawal was successful
refund.description: The amount of {{amount}} Rials has been withdrawn from your wallet.

failed.title: Operation failed
failed.description: Unfortunately, the operation was not successful. Please try again.
